title: FS: T206 Cy Young Portrait PSA 5, Joss Portrait raw vg/ex

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cy Young Portrait PSA 5, Joss Portrait raw vg/ex
posts.post_content:
Cy Young Portrait - PSA 5 - $1650 OBO

Nap Lajoie Portrait - PSA 4.5 - no longer available

Addie Joss Portrait - nice raw vg/ex - $270 OBO 

Emails to [url]eangyal@roadrunner.com[/url] get priority in order they arrive.  Thanks for looking.  Scans attached.  Would also consider trading for Old Judges on my wantlist.

Eric Angyal
great member, don't be afraid to buy raw cards from eric and he's also flexible on his prices.
